data.text:
Festus Marion HUGHES was born on 11 January 1881 in Jackson Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 7 February 1934 at the age of 53 in Jackson Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 9 February 1934 in Brassfield Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Jonathan Riley HUGHES and Elizabeth Louisa "Eliza" SCHWAB.

Spouse: Nettie RACHAU. Nettie RACHAU and Festus Marion HUGHES were married about 1904. No children were enumerated for this couple in the 1920 Federal census.

Floyd E. HUGHES was born in 1910 in Liberty Twp., Daviess, Missouri. Parents: Ernest S. HUGHES and Emma .Forrest Lilbert HUGHES was born on 23 June 1917 in Livingston Co., Missouri. He died on 7 December 1944 at the age of 27 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried in Wheeling Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: George Kelly HUGHES and Stella Louise "Dolly" CUTSHALL.

Spouse: Ruth Alene SCOTT. Ruth Alene SCOTT and Forrest Lilbert HUGHES were married on 3 May 1940. Children were: Ronald L. "Ron" HUGHES.

Francis E. J. HUGHES was born about 1925 in North Carolina. Parents: Francis Edward HUGHES and Vivian Irene WHITE.Francis Edward HUGHES was born on 9 October 1897 in Jackson Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 15 May 1981 at the age of 83 in Rancho Mirage, Riverside, California. He was a park superintendent in Youngstown, Ohio in 1930. Parents: Henry Turner HUGHES and Flora CARPENTER.

Spouse: Vivian Irene WHITE. Vivian Irene WHITE and Francis Edward HUGHES were married about 1922. Children were: Francis E. J. HUGHES, Donald R. HUGHES.

Francis M. HUGHES died on 22 December 1875. He was buried in Brassfield Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Milton HUGHES and Mary Jane VARNEY.Francis Marion HUGHES was born on 10 June 1827 in Whitley Co., Kentucky. He died on 6 January 1917 at the age of 89 in Jackson Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 8 January 1917 in Brassfield Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. He is identified as Marion M. Hughes in a county history. Parents: Isaac HUGHES and Martha "Mattie" CHITWOOD.

Spouse: Louisa Jane BRASSFIELD. Louisa Jane BRASSFIELD and Francis Marion HUGHES were married on 13 December 1855 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Children were: Jonathan Riley HUGHES, Andrew Jackson HUGHES, Martha Jane HUGHES, Mary Ellen HUGHES, Rachel Carter HUGHES, Henry Turner HUGHES, Sarah Elizabeth "Sallie" HUGHES, Louis Morgan HUGHES, Letitia Sophronia HUGHES.

Francis Marion HUGHES was born in February 1851 in Livingston Co., Missouri. He died on 6 November 1906 at the age of 55 in Livingston Co., Missouri. He was buried on 7 November 1906 in Mt. Olive Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Andrew Jackson HUGHES and Jane MEADOWS.

Spouse: Amanda Jane DAWKINS. Amanda Jane DAWKINS and Francis Marion HUGHES were married on 15 August 1875 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Children were: Harrison M. HUGHES, John Everett HUGHES, Joseph Marion HUGHES, Andrew Jackson "Andy" HUGHES, William "Willie" HUGHES, Mary Jane HUGHES, Jenny HUGHES, Grace HUGHES, Maude HUGHES, Pearl Ransom HUGHES.

Franklin HUGHES was born about 1862 in Missouri. Parents: John S. HUGHES and M. Isabelle GIBBS.Gailen Ray HUGHES was born on 10 June 1954 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He died on 12 June 1973 at the age of 19 in Pettis Co., Missouri. He was buried in Resthaven Memorial Gardens, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Kelly Junior HUGHES and Monetta Hallone Louisa "Bonnie" JOHNSON.Gale Warren HUGHES was born about 1939 in Blue Mound Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died in 1981 at the age of 42. Parents: Raymond Francis "Bud" HUGHES and Golda Lucille "Goldie" MINNIS.

Spouse: Helen Louise LITTLETON. Helen Louise LITTLETON and Gale Warren HUGHES were married on 7 October 1962 in Braymer, Caldwell, Missouri. The bride was of Braymer, the groom of Ludlow.

Garfield Hezekiah HUGHES was born on 6 November 1881 in Livingston Co., Missouri. He died on 16 April 1967 at the age of 85 in Dawn, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried in Welsh Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. He lived his entire life in the Dawn community except for a while in Coffey, Daviess Co., as a railroad section worker. He was an RFD mail carrier for 37 years. Parents: Rev. Hugh X. HUGHES and Harriett "Hattie" JONES.

Spouse: Dolly . Dolly and Garfield Hezekiah HUGHES were married about 1904. Children were: Daniel HUGHES, Matthew HUGHES, Roy HUGHES.

Spouse: Grace WELLS. Grace WELLS and Garfield Hezekiah HUGHES were married on 24 August 1926 in Dawn, Livingston, Missouri.

Spouse: Olive Ann THORNE. Olive Ann THORNE and Garfield Hezekiah HUGHES were married on 14 June 1936 in Livingston Co., Missouri.

Gary HUGHES was born (date unknown). Parents: Marshall Rawlins HUGHES and Wanda Bernadine DOUGLAS.

Spouse: Dana ALLNUTT. Dana ALLNUTT and Gary HUGHES were married.

George HUGHES was born on 27 March 1867. Parents: David HUGHES and Elizabeth MORTON.

Spouse: Anna GALPIN. Anna GALPIN and George HUGHES were married on 2 February 1895.

George Kelly HUGHES was born on 8 September 1888 in Jackson Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 26 July 1966 at the age of 77 in Chillicothe Hospital, Livingston, Missouri. He lived 4 1/2 miles southeast of Avalon in Grand River Township. He was buried on 28 July 1966 in Wheeling Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Noah HUGHES and Elvina Ellen "Ella" MADDOX.

Spouse: Stella Louise "Dolly" CUTSHALL. Stella Louise "Dolly" CUTSHALL and George Kelly HUGHES were married on 29 June 1910 in Trenton, Grundy, Missouri. Children were: Opal George HUGHES, Eva J. HUGHES, Forrest Lilbert HUGHES, Mildred HUGHES, Earl Brice HUGHES, Vera Jeanette HUGHES, Dorothy Geraldine HUGHES, Kelly Junior HUGHES, Clifford L. HUGHES.

Gladys Mae HUGHES was born on 9 March 1908 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She died on 8 November 2002 at the age of 94 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried on 11 November 2002 in Brassfield Cemetery, Grundy, Missouri. Parents: Oscar Simpson HUGHES and Bertha Lee STREET.

Spouse: Luther Rachel NIBARGER. Gladys Mae HUGHES and Luther Rachel NIBARGER were married on 17 March 1926 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Chillicothe. Albert Nibarger, father of Luther, gives consent. O. S. Hughes, father of Gladys, gives consent. Children were: Alfred NIBARGER, Jerry NIBARGER, Leroy NIBARGER, Sharon NIBARGER, Mary Evelyn NIBARGER, Shirley NIBARGER, Betty Louise NIBARGER, Alice Lee NIBARGER, Joyce NIBARGER.

Gladys Opal HUGHES was born on 19 January 1905 in Caldwell Co., Missouri. She died on 22 September 1997 at the age of 92 in Hamilton, Caldwell, Missouri. She died in a Hamilton nursing home; her home was in Breckenridge. She was buried on 25 September 1997 in Rose Hill Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri. There was cremation. Parents: Price E. HUGHES and Mary Belle OLIVER.

Spouse: Harry Robert POULSON. Gladys Opal HUGHES and Harry Robert POULSON were married on 7 March 1925 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Breckenridge. Children were: Mary Joan POULSON, John R. "Bud" POULSON.

Glen O. HUGHES was born about 1921 in Nebraska. Parents: Ezra HUGHES and Clara Estella RAWLINS.Gomer L. HUGHES was born on 27 December 1900 in Blue Mound Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 10 April 1901 at the age of 0 in Livingston Co., Missouri. He was buried in Welsh Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Robert Sadoc HUGHES and Sarah "Sally" DAVIES.Grace HUGHES was born on 3 December 1889 in Livingston Co., Missouri. She died in 1918 at the age of 29. Parents: Francis Marion HUGHES and Amanda Jane DAWKINS.Greg HUGHES was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Jenny KEITH. Jenny KEITH and Greg HUGHES were married.

Griffith HUGHES was born in October 1885 in Missouri. Parents: Richard HUGHES and Alice JONES.Grover Quentin HUGHES was born on 27 October 1912 in Livingston Co., Missouri. He died on 13 December 1985 at the age of 73 in Braymer, Caldwell, Missouri. He was buried on 16 December 1985 in Monroe Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Morgan Webster "Web" HUGHES and Inez May COLDIRON.

Spouse: Madelene E. VANSTANE. Madelene E. VANSTANE and Grover Quentin HUGHES were married on 10 July 1937 in Kansas City, Jackson, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Dawn. Children were: Jerry HUGHES, Judy Pauline HUGHES, Jandy Lea HUGHES.

Guy Staton HUGHES was born in January 1919 in Gallatin, Daviess, Missouri. He died on 15 February 1920 at the age of 1 in Gallatin, Daviess, Missouri. He was buried on 16 February 1920 in Centenary Cemetery, Daviess Co., Missouri. Parents: Roy Ernest HUGHES and Bertha THOMAS.Hall William HUGHES was born on 18 February 1923 in Nebraska. He died on 29 June 1996 at the age of 73 in Dawn, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried in Blue Mound "Burner" Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Ezra HUGHES and Clara Estella RAWLINS.

Spouse: Veda F. MCCRACKEN. Veda F. MCCRACKEN and Hall William HUGHES were married on 21 August 1943. Children were: William Dale "Bill" HUGHES, Richard Leon HUGHES.

Harold HUGHES was born about 1911 in Missouri. Parents: Roy Ernest HUGHES and Bertha THOMAS.Harold David HUGHES was born on 20 April 1923 in Dawn, Livingston, Missouri. He died on 12 March 2018 at the age of 94 in Chillicothe Hospital, Livingston, Missouri. His home was in Dawn. He was buried on 17 March 2018 in Welsh Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. He graduated from Dawn High School in 1941. Parents: William James HUGHES and Margaret Eunice HUGHES.

Spouse: Dorothy Evelyn BYRD. Dorothy Evelyn BYRD and Harold David HUGHES were married on 31 October 1948 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Dawn. The marriage license was issued in Kansas City and they married at Dawn. Children were: infant HUGHES, Douglas HUGHES, Morgan Mark HUGHES, Arthur HUGHES, Alice HUGHES, Marjorie HUGHES.

Harriett Nordicia HUGHES was born on 2 June 1902. She died on 8 January 1906 at the age of 3. She was buried in Welsh Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Robert Sadoc HUGHES and Sarah "Sally" DAVIES.Harrison HUGHES was born in December 1838 in Kentucky. He died on 30 March 1904 at the age of 65 in Livingston Co., Missouri. He was buried in Springhill, Livingston, Missouri. His gravestone is inscribed Sergt. Harrison Hughes, Co. L., 7 Mo. S. M. Cav. Parents: Andrew Jackson HUGHES and Jane MEADOWS.

Spouse: Harriet A. GRAVES. Harriet A. GRAVES and Harrison HUGHES were married on 25 December 1859 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Children were: Charles Thomas HUGHES, Ella Florence HUGHES, Jennie Elwell "Jennie" HUGHES, Laura Ethyl HUGHES, Margaret W. "Maggie" HUGHES, Stella Frances HUGHES.

Harrison George "Harry" HUGHES was born on 18 January 1888 in Dawn, Livingston, Missouri. He died on 29 March 1964 at the age of 76 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 1 April 1964 in Avalon Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. He was a graduate of Avalon High School and the Avalon College. Parents: Thomas G. HUGHES and Catherine WATKINS.

Spouse: Mary Augusta CUNNINGHAM. Mary Augusta CUNNINGHAM and Harrison George "Harry" HUGHES were married on 24 December 1917 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Hale. Children were: Leta Lynn HUGHES, Charles Thomas HUGHES, Lillia Catherine HUGHES.

Harrison M. HUGHES was born in November 1876 in Missouri. He died on 19 July 1902 at the age of 25 in Livingston Co., Missouri. He was buried on 21 July 1902 in Mt. Olive Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Francis Marion HUGHES and Amanda Jane DAWKINS.Harry Carpenter HUGHES was born on 10 June 1908 in Springhill, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Henry Turner HUGHES and Flora CARPENTER.Helen HUGHES was born about 1846 in Ohio.

Spouse: Levi SMITH. Helen HUGHES and Levi SMITH were married. Children were: John Levi SMITH.

Henry Berry HUGHES was born on 24 August 1906 in Springhill, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Henry Turner HUGHES and Flora CARPENTER.Henry Turner HUGHES was born on 12 April 1866 in Springhill, Livingston, Missouri. He died on 22 September 1955 at the age of 89. Parents: Francis Marion HUGHES and Louisa Jane BRASSFIELD.

Spouse: Flora CARPENTER. Flora CARPENTER and Henry Turner HUGHES were married about 1895. Children were: Lawrence Marion HUGHES, Francis Edward HUGHES, Henry Berry HUGHES, Harry Carpenter HUGHES.

Henry William Gleston HUGHES Sr. was born on 21 June 1896 in Dalton, Chariton, Missouri. He died on 5 January 1942 at the age of 45 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried in Dalton, Chariton, Missouri.

He was a porter in a Chillicothe hotel in 1940. Parents: William HUGHES and Elizabeth AGEE.

Spouse: Ilee PARKER. Ilee PARKER and Henry William Gleston HUGHES Sr. were married on 14 December 1924 in Dalton, Chariton, Missouri. Children were: Oletha HUGHES, William Glesston HUGHES Jr., Olivia Melissa HUGHES, Oliver Wendell HUGHES, Wendell Blaine HUGHES.

Hilord HUGHES was born about 1915 in Missouri. Parents: Roy Ernest HUGHES and Bertha THOMAS.Hobart Garrett HUGHES was born on 2 April 1897 in Jackson Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He stated he was born 2 April 1898 in his WWI draft registration. He died on 29 December 1957 at the age of 60 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 2 January 1958 in Brassfield Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Jonathan Riley HUGHES and Elizabeth Louisa "Eliza" SCHWAB.Howard Charles HUGHES was born on 13 July 1924 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Parents: John Morgan HUGHES and Persis S. HUGHES.Hugh HUGHES was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Catherine . Catherine and Hugh HUGHES were married. Children were: Thomas HUGHES.

Hugh J. HUGHES was born on 4 August 1864 in Wales. He died on 17 May 1884 at the age of 19. He was buried in Welsh Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Rev. Hugh X. HUGHES and Catherine WILLIAMS.Rev. Hugh X. HUGHES was born on 2 May 1837 in Cynwyd, Gwyddelwern, Merionethshire, Wales. He died on 22 January 1924 at the age of 86 in Blue Mound Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 23 January 1924 in Welsh Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. He is identified as "Grandpa" in the 1920 Federal census of the John M. and Persis Hughes family. Parents: Thomas HUGHES and Jane JONES.

Spouse: Catherine WILLIAMS. Catherine WILLIAMS and Rev. Hugh X. HUGHES were married. Children were: David HUGHES, Minnie R. HUGHES, Hugh J. HUGHES, Mary Lois HUGHES.

Spouse: Harriett "Hattie" JONES. Harriett "Hattie" JONES and Rev. Hugh X. HUGHES were married on 19 October 1876 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Bride and groom were of Dawn. The marriage record identifies him as Hugh H. Hughes. Children were: Robert Sadoc HUGHES, Tabitha E. HUGHES, Garfield Hezekiah HUGHES, Elizabeth Grace HUGHES, Persis S. HUGHES.

Ida Christine HUGHES was born on 28 October 1871 in Livingston Co., Missouri. She died on 16 November 1961 at the age of 90 in Missouri. She was buried in Evergreen Cemetery, Caldwell, Missouri. Parents: Milton HUGHES and Mary Jane VARNEY.

Spouse: James Allen THOMPSON. Ida Christine HUGHES and James Allen THOMPSON were married in April 1889 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Children were: Charles Olen THOMPSON, Hildred THOMPSON, Minerva Nell THOMPSON.

infant HUGHES was born on 23 April 1950. He/she died on 23 April 1950 at the age of 0. He/she was buried in Welsh Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Harold David HUGHES and Dorothy Evelyn BYRD.Isaac HUGHES was born about 1800.

Spouse: Martha "Mattie" CHITWOOD. Martha "Mattie" CHITWOOD and Isaac HUGHES were married. Children were: Elizabeth HUGHES, Andrew Jackson HUGHES, Francis Marion HUGHES.

Ivor Maynard HUGHES was born on 6 June 1918 in Blue Mound Twp., Livingston, Missouri. Parents: John Morgan HUGHES and Persis S. HUGHES.Jack W. HUGHES was born about 1936 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Parents: Daniel William HUGHES and Grace Frances JOHNSON.James HUGHES was born in Kentucky. He died before 1920. The marriage record of his daughter Elizabeth refers to him as "James Hughes, Esq. of Ray Co., Missouri.

Spouse: Elvira Ann SMITH. Elvira Ann SMITH and James HUGHES were married on 14 October 1842 in Ray Co., Missouri. Children were: Elizabeth "Bettie" HUGHES, Lulu R. HUGHES.

James HUGHES was born about 1866 in Missouri. Parents: John S. HUGHES and M. Isabelle GIBBS.James Arthur "Jim" HUGHES was born (date unknown). Parents: James Edward "Eddie" HUGHES and Barbara Alice DUNLOP.
